Models Documentation¶

Letting Model¶

class lettings.models.Letting(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A model representing a letting, linked to an address.

title¶

Title of the letting.

address¶

Associated Address instance.

Returns the title as its string representation.

Address Model¶

class lettings.models.Address(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A model for storing address details.

number¶

Street number.

street¶

Street name.

city¶

City name.

state¶

State abbreviation.

zip_code¶

Postal zip code.

country_iso_code¶

ISO country code.

Returns a string representation combining number and street.

Profile Model¶

class profiles.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

User profile model extending the default Django User model.

user¶

A one-to-one link to Django’s User model, ensuring each user has one unique profile.

Type:

OneToOneField

favorite_city¶

The user’s favorite city, optional.

Type:

CharField

__str__(self)[source]¶

Returns the username of the associated user, facilitating identification in the admin interface.
